Package Models

Class DataStoreManager

java.lang.Object
Models.DataStoreManager
public class DataStoreManager extends Object
Singleton class that keeps track of data objects to be used in the lifetime of the application. Provides Serialization and Deserialization implementations of data objects into files.
Since:
2022-10-26

  • Constructor Details

    • DataStoreManager

      public DataStoreManager()

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DataStoreManager getInstance()
      Creates a new instance of DataStoreManager if there isn't one, else returns the old created instance.
      Returns:
      Instance of DataStoreManager singleton.

    • addToStore

      public void addToStore(Serializable object)
      Adds the given object to the ArrayList stored in the DataStore
      Example: 
       
      Admin obj = new Admin();
      DataStoreManager.getInstance().addToStore(obj);
      Parameters:
      object - object to be added to the dataStore

    • removeFromStore

      public void removeFromStore(Serializable object)
      Removes the given object from the ArrayList stored in the DataStore.
      Example: 
       
      DataStoreManager.getInstance().removeFromStore(obj);
      Parameters:
      object - object to be removed from the dataStore

    • getStore

      public <T extends Serializable> ArrayList<T> getStore(Class<T> Deserializable)
      Given a Type class as the Key, retrieve the ArrayList Value from the DataStore dictionary.
      Example: 
       
 		ArrayList<Admin> adminList = DataStoreManager.getInstance().getStore(Admin.class);
      Type Parameters:
      T - Generic type that is Serializable
      Parameters:
      Deserializable - Type class of the ArrayList to be retrieved. e.g. Admin.class
      Returns:
      The ArrayList for the given class from the DataStore dictionary

    • isEmptyDataFolder

      public boolean isEmptyDataFolder()
      Check whether any data files have been created
      Returns:
      true if there are no data files created and the folder is empty

    • loadAll

      public void loadAll()
      Retrieve all Serialized datafiles from the project root folder, and Deserialize the files into the DataStore dictionary.
      Example: 
       
      DataStoreManager.getInstance().Load();

    • saveAll

      public void saveAll()
      Manual call to serialize all data stored in DataStore.

    • save

      public <T extends Serializable> void save(Class<T> serializable)
      Manual call to save a single class only.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the object to be serialized.
      Parameters:
      serializable - object to be serialized.

    • parseLayout

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Seat>> parseLayout(String seatString)
      Converts a given seat string to a cinema seat layout. Each row is delimited with a "." 0 = Normal Seat Type 1 = Special needs Seat Type X = Prohibited Seat Type C = Couple Seat Type
      Example: 
       
 A string of:  Will produce:
 "00X0."+      [][]_[]
 "00X0."+      [][]_[]
 "XXXX"        _ _ _ _
      Parameters:
      seatString -
      Returns:
      See Also:
      • SeatType

    • getReferenceMap

      public Map<UUID,Object> getReferenceMap()
      Gets the instance of the reference map for deserialized object tracking
      Returns:
      current reference map
